verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H6509><s%>, Be fruitful, and multiply <S%H7235><s%>, and replenish <S%H4390><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And the fear of you <S%H4172><s%> and the dread of you <S%H2844><s%> shall be upon every beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and upon every bird <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>; with all wherewith the ground <S%H127><s%> teemeth <S%H7430><s%>, and all the fishes <S%H1709><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, into your hand <S%H3027><s%> are they delivered <S%H5414><s%>.
Every moving thing <S%H7431><s%> that liveth <S%H2416><s%> shall be food <S%H402><s%> for you <S%H3418><s%>; as the green herb <S%H6212><s%> have I given you all <S%H5414><s%>.
But <S%H389><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> with the life <S%H5315><s%> thereof <S%H1818><s%>, which is the blood thereof <S%H398><s%>, shall ye not eat.

And surely <S%H389><s%> your blood <S%H1818><s%>, the blood of your lives <S%H5315><s%>, will I require <S%H1875><s%>; at the hand <S%H3027><s%> of every beast <S%H2416><s%> will I require it <S%H1875><s%>: and at the hand <S%H3027><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, even at the hand <S%H3027><s%> of every man <S%H120><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>, will I require <S%H1875><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>.

Whoso sheddeth <S%H8210><s%> man <S%H120><s%>'s blood <S%H1818><s%>, by man <S%H120><s%> shall his blood <S%H1818><s%> be shed <S%H8210><s%>: For in the image <S%H6754><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he man <S%H120><s%>.
And you <S%H6509><s%>, be ye fruitful, and multiply <S%H7235><s%>; bring forth abundantly <S%H8317><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>, and multiply therein <S%H7235><s%>.
And God <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto Noah <S%H5146><s%>, and to his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him <S%H559><s%>, saying,
And I <S%H6965><s%>, behold, I establish my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you <S%H2233><s%>, and with your seed after you <S%H310><s%>;

and with every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that is with you <S%H5775><s%>, the birds, the cattle <S%H929><s%>, and every beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> with you <S%H3318><s%>; of all that go out of the ark <S%H8392><s%>, even every beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And I will establish <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you <S%H1320><s%>; neither shall all flesh be cut off <S%H3772><s%> any more by the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the flood <S%H3999><s%>; neither shall there any more be a flood <S%H3999><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, This is the token <S%H226><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I <S%H589><s%> make <S%H5414><s%> between me and you and every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that is with you <S%H5769><s%>, for perpetual generations <S%H1755><s%>:
I do set <S%H5414><s%> my bow <S%H7198><s%> in the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and it shall be for a token <S%H226><s%> of a covenant <S%H1285><s%> between me and the earth <S%H776><s%>.
And it shall come to pass <S%H6049><s%>, when I bring a cloud <S%H6051><s%> over the earth <S%H776><s%>, that the bow <S%H7198><s%> shall be seen <S%H7200><s%> in the cloud <S%H6051><s%>,

and I will remember <S%H2142><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>, which is between me and you and every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>; and the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall no more <S%H5750><s%> become a flood <S%H3999><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> all flesh <S%H1320><s%>.

And the bow <S%H7198><s%> shall be in the cloud <S%H6051><s%>; and I will look upon it <S%H7200><s%>, that I may remember <S%H2142><s%> the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and <S%H996><s%> every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%> that is upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Noah <S%H5146><s%>, This is the token <S%H226><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I have established <S%H6965><s%> between me and all flesh <S%H1320><s%> that is upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%>, that went forth <S%H3318><s%> from the ark <S%H8392><s%>, were Shem <S%H8035><s%>, and Ham <S%H2526><s%>, and Japheth <S%H3315><s%>: and Ham <S%H2526><s%> is the father <S%H1><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.
These three <S%H7969><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%>: and of these was the whole earth <S%H776><s%> overspread <S%H5310><s%>.
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to be a husbandman <S%H376><s%>, and planted <S%H5193><s%> a vineyard <S%H3754><s%>:
and he drank <S%H8354><s%> of the wine <S%H3196><s%>, and was drunken <S%H7937><s%>; and he was uncovered <S%H1540><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%>.

And Ham <S%H2526><s%>, the father <S%H1><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, saw <S%H7200><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>, and told <S%H5046><s%> his two <S%H8147><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>.

And Shem <S%H8035><s%> and Japheth <S%H3315><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a garment <S%H8071><s%>, and laid <S%H7760><s%> it upon both <S%H8147><s%> their shoulders <S%H7926><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> backward <S%H322><s%>, and covered <S%H3680><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of their father <S%H1><s%>; and their faces <S%H6440><s%> were backward <S%H322><s%>, and they saw <S%H7200><s%> not their father <S%H1><s%>'s nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> awoke <S%H3364><s%> from his wine <S%H3196><s%>, and knew <S%H3045><s%> what his youngest <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> had done unto him <S%H6213><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, Cursed <S%H779><s%> be Canaan <S%H3667><s%>; A servant <S%H5650><s%> of servants <S%H5650><s%> shall he be unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Shem <S%H8035><s%>; And let Canaan <S%H3667><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>.

God <S%H430><s%> enlarge <S%H6601><s%> Japheth <S%H3315><s%>, And let him dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the tents <S%H168><s%> of Shem <S%H8035><s%>; And let Canaan <S%H3667><s%> be his servant <S%H5650><s%>.
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the flood <S%H3999><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.
And all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: And he died <S%H4191><s%>.
